GapFillInput.Title: Patterns with abstract nouns and relative clauses
GapFillInput.Instruction: Fill each gap with a relative pronoun.

Content.Question:
1. What do you think of the way that Flavia creeps round her manager?
2. I think that Johnny had reached a point where he just dried up and couldn’t think of anything else to say
at the interview.
3. Kim and Mike had seen several cases where people got too emotional or aggressive in their attitude to work.
4. The wine company was going through a period of time in which all employees were encouraged to take at
least three days holiday each month.
5. It is difficult to assess the extent to which the new motorway will affect the nearby housing estate.
6. The most challenging part of the conference for Elsa was the part where|when the team had to give
individual presentations to the audience.
7. Many people believe that a successful business depends on the way in which employees are treated.
8. There is no reason at all why Carla needed to worry about making a good impression on her boyfriend’s family.
9. A lot depends on the way that Jean decides to manage the new health club.
10. I believe there is one main reason why Beatrice decided to emigrate to Australia.
